PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-00752003-01-300TC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (PART III) by establishing a time limit of four minutes after an alarm is sounded within which a second brigade of fire-fighting vehicles must be able to reach the half-way point on the farthest runway used by commercial passenger-carrying aircraft, effective June 1, 2003.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0042 Publication Date: 2003-02-12
AttachmentsAttachment
